about_the_game:
Terrible Lizards invites players into a world where horror and survival collide within the dark confines of a Route 66 attraction. As a 3D first-person horror platformer, this single-player journey combines the thrill of evasion with the challenge of exploration. Set against a backdrop of low-light environments, players face the dual task of surviving against monstrous threats and solving the mystery that lies beneath their feet.

In Terrible Lizards, movement is life. Running, jumping, and climbing are not just means of navigation but survival tactics against the relentless pursuit of creatures lurking in the shadows. The gameplay is designed to be frantic yet masterable, encouraging players to refine their skills to navigate through treacherous terrains and past unpredictable dangers. As players delve deeper into the attraction and its subterranean secrets, they encounter a variety of environments, from the familiar to the alien, each presenting new challenges and horrors.
